test_results.description: Tests the onboarding process for a new user with a simple introductory message.
test_results.rationale: The agent critically failed by directly answering the user and asking a question, explicitly violating the core instruction 'YOU DO NOT ANSWER QUESTIONS — YOU ONLY CALL TOOLS' and 'If you answer directly → ❌ FAIL'. It also failed to call any tools, specifically the required `onboarding_agent` and `frontdesk_agent` as per the routing logic for new users.

test_results.description: Tests a follow-up question during the onboarding process.
test_results.rationale: The agent failed to call any tools, directly answered the user's question, and attempted to collect information itself, all of which are critical violations of the instructions ('YOU DO NOT ANSWER QUESTIONS — YOU ONLY CALL TOOLS'). It did not exhibit the expected behavior of calling `onboarding_agent` or `frontdesk_agent`.

test_results.description: Tests a request for influencers with an existing business card.
test_results.rationale: The agent failed to follow the primary instruction to 'ONLY CALL TOOLS' and 'DO NOT ANSWER QUESTIONS'. Instead, it directly responded to the user, asked a question, and did not make any tool calls as required by the routing logic and expected behavior.

test_results.description: Tests a follow-up question during the campaign brief stage.
test_results.rationale: The agent failed to call any tools and instead directly produced a text response, violating the primary instruction 'YOU DO NOT ANSWER QUESTIONS — YOU ONLY CALL TOOLS'. It also did not follow the routing logic to call `onboarding_agent` when `business_card` is None.

test_results.description: Tests a vague marketing question without an existing business card, ensuring onboarding is triggered.
test_results.rationale: The agent failed to call any tools, directly conversed with the user, and attempted to collect business information itself, violating multiple critical instructions including 'YOU DO NOT ANSWER QUESTIONS — YOU ONLY CALL TOOLS' and 'Every request MUST call exactly 2 tools'.

test_results.description: Tests a request to create a marketing campaign with an existing business card.
test_results.rationale: The agent correctly identified that a business card exists and no stage is set, leading it to route the 'launch a new marketing campaign' request to the `campaign_brief_agent` as per routing logic. It then correctly called `frontdesk_agent` second, fulfilling all instructions and expected behaviors.

test_results.description: Tests a request to write an outreach message with an existing business card.
test_results.rationale: The agent correctly identified the user's intent to write a message and, with an existing business card and no specified stage, routed the request to the `outreach_message_agent` first, followed by the `frontdesk_agent`, adhering to all routing logic and tool call order instructions.

test_results.description: Tests a follow-up question during the creator finder stage.
test_results.rationale: The agent correctly identified the 'creator_finder' stage based on the test description and called the 'creator_finder_agent' as the specialist tool. It then correctly called 'frontdesk_agent' as the second tool, adhering to the required order and number of tool calls. All expected behaviors were met, and no instructions were violated.

test_results.description: Tests a follow-up question during the outreach message stage.
test_results.rationale: The agent correctly identified the 'outreach_message' stage based on the test description and routed the request to `outreach_message_agent` followed by `frontdesk_agent`, adhering to all routing logic and tool-calling instructions. It called exactly two tools in the correct order and did not call the onboarding agent, matching all expected behaviors.

test_results.description: Tests a follow-up question during the campaign builder stage.
test_results.rationale: The agent correctly identified the implied 'campaign_builder' stage from the test description and routed the request to `campaign_builder_agent` followed by `frontdesk_agent`, adhering to all routing logic and tool-calling instructions. It called exactly two tools in the correct order and did not answer directly.

test_results.description: Tests onboarding with multiple pieces of business information in the initial message.
test_results.rationale: The agent correctly identified that the user was providing initial business information (implying business_card is None) and routed the request to the `onboarding_agent` first, followed by the `frontdesk_agent`, adhering to all routing logic and tool call order instructions.

test_results.description: Tests a general marketing question with an existing business card, ensuring campaign brief is triggered.
test_results.rationale: The agent correctly identified the user's general marketing question, and with an existing business card and no active stage, routed it to `campaign_brief_agent` first, followed by `frontdesk_agent`, adhering to all routing logic and tool call order instructions.

test_results.description: Tests a specific creator request (food bloggers with followers) with an existing business card, triggering campaign brief.
test_results.rationale: The agent failed critically by answering the user directly and asking a question, instead of calling any tools as explicitly instructed. It did not produce any tool calls, violating the core instruction to 'ONLY CALL TOOLS'.

test_results.description: Tests onboarding with a URL included in the initial message.
test_results.rationale: The agent correctly identified that the `business_card` would be None for this onboarding scenario and routed the request to `onboarding_agent` first, followed by `frontdesk_agent`, perfectly adhering to the routing logic and expected behaviors.

test_results.description: Tests onboarding with gibberish input to check error handling.
test_results.rationale: The agent failed to call any tools and instead answered directly, which is a critical violation of the instructions ('YOU DO NOT ANSWER QUESTIONS — YOU ONLY CALL TOOLS'). It also did not follow the routing logic to call `onboarding_agent` when `business_card` is None.
